data.description: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac + Feeding Frenzy/Subsistence + Adrenaline Junkie/Rampage/KC

PvP: Hammer Forged/Polygonal/Arrowhead + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Tunnel Vision/DSR/Heating Up + Tap the Trigger/KC/Thresh

45 recoil direction is very low, so arrowhead would be a great choice. 16 base zoom is not too bad. 10 range stat points = 1.69M increase to range drop off
